blogPost.excerpt: Get safer and more effective workouts at home with 1:1 voice feedback to improve your posture and encouragement to push you further. Counts reps as you do them ⏱️ Instant suggestions on improving posture 🗨️ Cheers you throughout your training session 🗣️
blogPost.body: Get safer and more effective workouts at home with 1:1 voice feedback to improve your posture and encouragement to push you further. Counts reps as you do them ⏱️ Instant suggestions on improving posture 🗨️ Cheers you throughout your training session 🗣️
blogPost.title: Physique AI (Android & iOS) - AI-powered 1:1 posture correction to improve home workouts
blogPost.author: Vignesh Prabhu

localize.description: 通过1：1语音反馈改善您的姿势，并鼓励您进一步推动，在家中获得更安全、更有效的锻炼。在您做代表时计算他们的数量⏱️关于改进姿势的即时建议🗨️在整个培训课程中为您干杯🗣️
localize.tagline: 人工智能支持的1：1姿势校正，可改善家庭锻炼

localize.description: 通過1：1語音反饋改善您的姿勢，並鼓勵您進一步推動，在家中獲得更安全、更有效的鍛鍊。在您做代表時計算他們的數量⏱️關於改進姿勢的即時建議🗨️在整個培訓課程中爲您乾杯🗣️
localize.tagline: 人工智能支持的1：1姿勢校正，可改善家庭鍛鍊

previous.excerpt: OneBar is a shared Q&A knowledge base for your team. With our new Chrome Extension, you can access OneBar answers in any web app you use. Improve your sales responses in Gmail, speed up case resolution in Intercom, or even optimize prospecting on LinkedIn.
previous.title: OneBar for Chrome - Q&A knowledge base built into every app you use

localize.description: OneBar是您团队的共享问答知识库。通过我们新的Chrome扩展，您可以在您使用的任何网络应用中访问OneBar答案。改进您在Gmail中的销售响应，加快Intercom中的案例解决，甚至优化LinkedIn上的潜在客户。
localize.tagline: 您使用的每个应用程序都内置了问答知识库

localize.description: OneBar是您團隊的共享問答知識庫。通過我們新的Chrome擴展，您可以在您使用的任何網絡應用中訪問OneBar答案。改進您在Gmail中的銷售響應，加快Intercom中的案例解決，甚至優化LinkedIn上的潛在客戶。
localize.tagline: 您使用的每個應用程序都內置了問答知識庫
